item.title: Apple Releases Xcode 26 Beta 7 With GPT-5 Support and Claude Integration
item.description: Apple today released the latest version of Xcode 26, introducing several new features that developers can take advantage of. ChatGPT in Xcode now supports GPT-5, so developers can choose to start new

item.title: In Xcode 26, Apple shows first signs of offering ChatGPT alternatives
item.description: Claude support in Xcode heralds bigger moves across the ecosystem.
